component.text: Products available for the Cisco Self-Defending Network
Roll over each product for more information.
*NOTE: Each product can be deployed independently or as part of an integrated security design.
Cisco IOS platforms with integrated IPS, VPN, and stateful FW
Cisco PIX 500 Series Security Appliances with integrated VPN
Integrated network IDS and IPS
Security modules for Cisco Catalyst 6500 Series Switches and Cisco 7600 Series Routers
Cisco ASA 5500 Series Adaptive Security Appliances (ASA) with integrated VPN
Appliance-based network intrusion detection system (IDS) and intrusion prevention system (IPS)
Cisco Secure ACS
Cisco Security Agent endpoint protection software
Cisco Security Manager, Cisco Security MARS, Cisco Router and Security Device Manager (SDM), and other GUI-based device managers

Features:
Supports secure IP connectivity.
Ensures perimeter security and access control. This product is no longer being sold and may not be supported.
Ensures intrusion detection and prevention, and is integrated into Cisco IOS routers, PIX Security Appliances and Cisco Adaptive Security Appliances (ASA).
Provides security throughout the data center including access control and port security.
Ensures perimeter security, access control, and intrusion prevention.
Standalone device that ensures intrusion detection and prevention.
Ensures that users have the proper authority to access corporate resources.
Protects servers and desktops from the damaging effects of known and unknown threats.
Provides device management for security appliances.
